attributes.action: Force Debt Collection Agencies to disclose the actual amount they have paid to purchase a debt and be forced to pass on this information to the borrower
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Debt Collection Agencies are known to purchase "bad debt" from mainstream lenders for as little as 8pence per pound of debt.They then ask the original borrower to repay the original sum in full,making huge profits and causing unneccessary stress and further hardship on the borrower often through questionable practises
